title: Caresure Women Care Insurance Policy
content1: Unique Cover: A specially designed policy that provides multi-fold benefits for women
content2: Automatic Restoration: 100% of the Sum Insured is restored once in a policy period
content3: Delivery Expenses: Normal & C-section delivery expenses are covered (including pre and post-natal)

title: Caresure Comprehensive Insurance Policy
content1: Automatic Restoration: Get 100% of the basic Sum Insured restored once in a policy year
content2: Buy-back PED: Optional cover to reduce the waiting period in respect of Pre-Existing Diseases
content3: Mid-term inclusion: Newly married/wedded spouse and new born baby are covered on payment of additional premium
